meta.name: description
meta.content: Centralia Elementary School District serves students from Buena Park, Anaheim, La Palma and Cypress and is located in Buena Park, CA.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Centralia Elementary School Buena Park Anaheim La Palma Cypress Education

img.alt: Los Coyotes Jump Rope Team

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1160px; height: auto
div.p: The Los Coyotes Child Care jump rope team, Jumping Coyotes, received 7 Gold Medals, 1 Silver and 1 Bronze at the National Jump Rope Competition at Disney World Florida this past week. One student also set a National age division record of 80 double unders in 30 seconds. We are so proud of our Jumping Coyotes!

Available to assist you while the school/district offices are closed. School & district staff are available to assist you remotely.

img.alt: FREE “Grab & Go” Meals During Our School Closure

h3.a: FREE “Grab & Go” Meals During Our School Closure

div.div: Centralia School District will continue to provide FREE “Grab & Go” meals to all children 18 and under, 3 days a week during our school closure.
